description: Système téléphonique autonome (STA) pour les petites les navires de taille moyenne et de grande taille
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
### Self-Powered Telephone Tender Notice

**Reference:** PW-__QD-052-29350
**Publication Date:** 2024-05-10
**Solicitation Number:** F7048-220004/A
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-04T14:00:00

**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Tender Description:**
The Government of Canada, Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), is seeking a commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) self-powered telephone system for the Canadian Coast Guard's small, medium, and large vessels. The purpose of this standing offer is to purchase a COTS self-powered telephone system, as well as individual components for sparing for existing self-powered telephone systems, with the option for training/commissioning services.

**Deliverables:**
- One COTS self-powered telephone system for each of the following vessel categories:
    * small vessels
    * medium vessels
    * large vessels

**Trade Agreements:**
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement

**Contracting Entity:**
- Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
- Address: 11 Laurier St., Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**
- Name: Greg Vick
- Email: greg.vick@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Phone Number: (343) 550-4125

**Attachments:**
- tender documents (available on canadabuys.canada.ca)

Please submit your proposal in either English or French. The Contractor is responsible for ensuring compliance with all applicable trade agreements. The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Important Dates:**

- Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-04T14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: None
- Expected
